law.catch_line: Combination to control or interfere with bidding prohibited.
law.text: No persons shall combine, by any rule, bylaw or otherwise, for the purpose of controlling, or in any way interfering with the free and unrestricted right to bid on or purchase leaf tobacco offered for sale at public auction at any warehouse or place of sale where tobacco is sold by warehousemen for others in this state.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4810.
